column4: Need help installing 6.10 from dvd, 6.06 won't reconize dvd, but see's cd's and boots from 6.06 cd
it says dvd on the front; and in the disk manager for 6.06 it says dvd read. Is the dvd distro a live cd?
okay I'll reinstall and try again.
is it starting to boot and failing - or just not starting
do you get the boot menu up for the dvd or will it not even read the cd at boot time
it goes straight to grub, however if i put in 6.06 live cd in it boots
either the drive is dead for DVD's or the media/burn of the dvd is rubbish
why not burn the edgy cd - rather than dvd
I'm out of cd-r . I copied the alternative cd to a usb drive and tried doing dist-upgrade by mounting the usb drive as a cd and adding it as a repository. But it always botches the upgrade.
damn, okay I'll go out and buy more cd-r
